name: Polyzoom
description:
Polyzoom is an open world platformer where the camera zooms out each time a boss is defeated.

Collect coins to increase health and guide small creatures to your farm. Then, collect achievements to unlock skins and customize the look of your player.

CONTAINS:

  • 5 large areas to explore
  • 4 bosses with unique attacks
  • 15 achievements
  • 20 unlockable skins
  • An unlockable hard mode
  • Several hours of gameplay

The original soundtrack can be listened to on YouTube.
